title: Electric field from the potential - calculus

content.question: The electric potential <math alttext="V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> as a function of the position <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis is given by the equation <math alttext="V equals negative 4 x squared, plus 3 x, plus 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. The electric field <math alttext="E sub x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> as a function of <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is given by

choices.label: <math alttext="four thirds x cubed minus three halves x squared, minus 8 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative four thirds x cubed, plus three halves x squared, plus 8 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative 4 x squared, plus 3 x, plus 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
